about_the_game:
Panzerkampf is a PvP team tank game with tank battles from World War II. You will play with historically accurate tanks and also experimental tanks that existed as concept ideas. Modern tanks will also come into play.

Key aspects of the game are the emphasis on a balanced game setup (no P2W!), excellent gameplay and a clear and intuitive user interface.

Panzerkampf is free to play. Your are welcome to try the game on our official website .

CHOOSE A TANK AND GET INTO THE BATTLE

Select your tank, load up your ammo and equipment, give your crew members their daily orders and go into battle!

BEGIN UPGRADING PARAMETERS AND POLISHING APPEARANCE OF YOUR TANKS

Upgrade your guns, engines and other parameters as you fight. Send members of your crews to regular training exercises. Put different types of camouflage, stickers and badges on your tanks.

PLAY YOUR OWN PERSONAL TANK BATTLES OR FIGHT SIDE BY SIDE WITH FRIENDS

Call to battle from your tank for yourself, or team up with friends in the game. Form a platoon and work together in battles to achieve the maximum number of victories possible. Join a clan and interact and fight alongside other tankers!

IMPROVE YOUR COMBAT SKILLS

Advance through battles, gain combat experience, improve your personal stats and fearlessly climb the in-game leaderboards. Fight in new game modes (Death Match, Team Flag Conquest, Battle Royale and more) as they are released.

FIGHT IN AN ENVIRONMENT RENDERED WITH THE MOST MODERN TECHNOLOGY

The game uses state-of-the-art High Definition Rendering Pipeline. Tank models and environments are highly detailed. Particle effects use advanced animation and rendering techniques. The tank sounds are those of real tank engines and weapons, including of course the legendary German 88!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 4-6 core CPU from AMD or Intel
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX980 or RX580 class GPU
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: MB embedded
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Ryzen 5600 or Intel i5-12400
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 3060ti or RX 6800 class GPU
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: MB embedded

short_description: World war of tanks rages on. Join the battle in one of our real-world tanks! Upgrade your vehicles and destroy the enemy! Play with friends and dominate the war! Play for free, in intuitive and easy to grasp UI, with state-of-the-art graphics, particle effects and authentic sound!
